name: part_010
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora, Ookami Mio, Tsunomaki Watame, Shiranui Flare, and Omaru Polka perform 'SAVIOR IN THE DARK'.
Transition to a 'Pekora Slot' pachislot-style animation segment.
A special story animation plays out like a bonus win on a slot machine.

subtitles.original: ...のだろうか それは剣に聞け
subtitles.english: ...I wonder? Ask the sword.

subtitles.original: 正義だとか愛など 俺は追いかけない
subtitles.english: Justice or love—I don't chase after such things.

subtitles.original: 闇に生まれ闇に忍び 闇を切り裂く
subtitles.english: Born in darkness, hiding in darkness, I tear the darkness apart.

subtitles.original: 遥かな いにしえから受け継いだ
subtitles.english: Inherited from the distant, ancient past...

subtitles.original: 使命だから
subtitles.english: ...because it's my mission!

subtitles.original: 行け！ 疾風のごとく 魔戒の剣士よ
subtitles.english: Go! Like a gale, O Makai Knight!

subtitles.original: 月満つる夜に
subtitles.english: On this night of the full moon,

subtitles.original: 金色になれ
subtitles.english: turn into gold!

subtitles.original: 雄々しき姿の 孤独な戦士よ
subtitles.english: A lonely warrior with a valiant figure,

subtitles.original: 魂を込めた 怒りの刃叩きつけて
subtitles.english: Strike down with your blade of wrath, imbued with your soul!

subtitles.original: 時代に輝け 牙狼！
subtitles.english: Shine through the ages, GARO!

subtitles.original: いつの日かお前に 分かって欲しい
subtitles.english: I want you to understand someday,

subtitles.original: 戦いだけに生きた俺の胸の内を
subtitles.english: what's inside the heart of one who lived only for battle.

subtitles.original: 愛に逸れ 愛に憎み 愛を求める
subtitles.english: Straying from love, hating love, seeking love.

subtitles.original: わずかな 安らぎさえ打ち捨てた
subtitles.english: Casting aside even the slightest peace...

subtitles.original: 誓いだけど
subtitles.english: ...it's my vow!

subtitles.original: 立て！ 修羅のごとく 魔戒の剣士よ
subtitles.english: Stand! Like an Asura, O Makai Knight!

subtitles.original: 運命の歌の 命ずるままに
subtitles.english: Just as the song of destiny commands!

subtitles.original: 月夜に輝く 孤高の戦士よ
subtitles.english: A solitary warrior shining in the moonlight,

subtitles.original: 迫り来る影を 一網打尽 叩き斬って
subtitles.english: Strike and cut down the approaching shadows all at once!

subtitles.original: 気高く吠えろ 牙狼！
subtitles.english: Howl noble and high, GARO!

subtitles.original: 行け！ 疾風のごとく 魔戒の剣士よ
subtitles.english: Go! Like a gale, O Makai Knight!

subtitles.original: 月満つる夜に
subtitles.english: On this night of the full moon,

subtitles.original: 金色になれ
subtitles.english: turn into gold!

subtitles.original: 雄々しき姿の 孤独な戦士よ
subtitles.english: A lonely warrior with a valiant figure,

subtitles.original: 魂を込めた 怒りの刃叩きつけて
subtitles.english: Strike down with your blade of wrath, imbued with your soul!

subtitles.original: 時代に輝け 牙狼！
subtitles.english: Shine through the ages, GARO!

subtitles.original: 行け！ 疾風のごとく 定めの剣士よ
subtitles.english: Go! Like a gale, O Knight of Destiny!

subtitles.original: 闇に光を
subtitles.english: Bring light to the darkness!

subtitles.original: 警戒
subtitles.english: Caution

subtitles.original: ボーナス、確定
subtitles.english: Bonus Confirmed

subtitles.original: 今度こそ君だけは幸せにしてみせるぺこ
subtitles.english: This time, I'll definitely make only you happy, peko.

subtitles.original: ボーナス確定
subtitles.english: Bonus Confirmed

subtitles.original: これが実力ぺこ
subtitles.english: This is my true power, peko.
